ingredients.ingredient: 1 (6 pound) beef brisket, trimmed of fat

cookingTips: Trim excess fat but leave some for moisture and flavor
Cook on low for 10-12 hours until fork-tender
The dill pickle liquid adds unexpected tanginess that balances barbecue sweetness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how the unusual addition of dill pickle juice creates a unique tangy-sweet flavor profile that distinguishes this brisket recipe.
